protein.general_function: Involved in serine-type endopeptidase inhibitor activity
protein.specific_function: Inhibits factor Xa activity in the presence of protein Z, calcium and phospholipid

reference.reference_text: Han X, Huang ZF, Fiehler R, Broze GJ Jr: The protein Z-dependent protease inhibitor is a serpin. Biochemistry. 1999 Aug 24;38(34):11073-8.
